Changelog
=========

1.1 (2013-01-17)
----------------

- Use 301 instead of 302 when doing redirect
  curl -s -w "%{http_code} %{url_effective}\\n" "http://localhost:8080/Plone/fr" -o /dev/null

1.0 (2012-12-06)
----------------

- Fix bugs with many domains on the same URL -> Use ordering of domains


1.0a1 (2012-05-11)
------------------

- Initial release
